subject: HS Pro Software Update
description_text:
Hi,

Ive just had the HS Pro delivered, however the software does not give me
the option to manage it:
[image: image.png]

According to screenshots on your website and instruction manual (which also
shows v2.1.2), I should be able to see an additional Device Overview at the
bottom named Gear Shift.

Thanks

Ian

conversations.body_text: Hi Ian Hartwell,    Please uninstall SIMSONN Manager version 2.1.2 from your computer first, then download and install SIMSONN Manager version 2.1.3 from our official website.  SIMSONN Manager 2.1.3 adds full support for HS Pro 2-in-1 shifter configuration and calibration. Please use this version to complete the setup and calibration.     https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download

That version wasn't there when I raised the ticket! :P

P.s, you forgot to add HS Pro to the note "Note: For Simsonn Plus, Plus X,
Pro X, Pro X Ultra Pedals and HB Pro, SQ Pro"

Thanks for updating the site and replying so quickly, much appreciated

On Wed, 7 Jan 2026 at 13:56, support@simsonn.com
Hi Ian Hartwell,  Thank you for the reminder. I have informed our engineers to make the necessary changes and add support for HS Pro.Â
